---
title: "feature_counts"
output: html_document
date: "2025-12-15"
---

```{bash}
# Run an interactive session on the HPC. Move to your working directory. 

srun -p msc_appbio -t 00-03:00 --pty /bin/bash -l
cd /scratch/grp/msc_appbio/Group14_ABCC/DESeq2

# Load module Subread and make sure featureCounts is available. 

module load subread
which featureCounts

# Run featureCounts paired-end

featureCounts \
  -T 8 \
  -p \
  -B \
  -C \
  -t gene \
  -g gene_id \
  -a GCF_000017085.1_ASM1708v1_genomic.fixed.gtf \
  -o counts.txt \
  B1.sorted.bam B2.sorted.bam B3.sorted.bam \
  B4.sorted.bam B5.sorted.bam B6.sorted.bam
  
# Check output

ls -lh counts.txt counts.txt.summary
head counts.txt

```
